meanings.sent1: She blushed when she received one of his sexts.
meanings.sent2: He sent her a few sexts to spice up their conversation.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected sexts from her grandma were definitely not what she was expecting.
meanings.sent4: His words in the sexts painted vivid images in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The scandalous sexts spread like wildfire among the students.

meanings.definition: To send sexually explicit text messages.
meanings.sent1: He often sexts his partner when they are apart.
meanings.sent2: She decided to sext him a naughty message to surprise him.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about accidentally sexting his boss instead of his partner.
meanings.sent4: The politician's leaked sexts caused a media frenzy.
meanings.sent5: She carefully crafted each sext to convey her desires effectively.
